summary: Build a meme coin website inspired by theuselesscoin.com, rebranded as 'The Pointless Coin'. The site should replicate the look and feel of the original but use custom branding and a user-provided coin image.
architectural_notes: Single-page meme coin website, static or near-static with fun/animated UI elements
Branding: 'The Pointless Coin' replacing all references to 'The Useless Coin'
known_issues: User has not yet provided the coin photo — placeholder needed until image is supplied
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- A shiny gold coin with a bold letter 'P' embossed in the center, cartoon-style with a gleaming metallic finish and a slight comic glow effect around the edge, circular format (pointless-coin.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a full-page hero section with a large animated coin logo (using the generated coin image), the headline 'THE POINTLESS COIN', a punchy meme-style tagline (e.g. 'Absolutely no utility. Completely pointless. 100% yours.'), and two CTA buttons: 'Buy Now' and 'Join Community'.
Create a sticky navigation bar with the coin logo, the name 'The Pointless Coin', and anchor links to all page sections (e.g. About, Tokenomics, How to Buy, Roadmap, Community).

Create an 'About' section explaining the coin in a humorous, self-aware meme style — emphasising that The Pointless Coin has no utility, no roadmap promises, and no serious purpose, just like the original theuselesscoin.com framing.

Create a 'Tokenomics' section displaying key stats (total supply, tax, liquidity lock, etc.) in a visually bold card or grid layout with meme-style labelling (e.g. '1 Billion Supply — Because why not').
Create a 'How to Buy' section with numbered steps (e.g. Create a wallet → Get ETH/SOL → Swap for $POINTLESS → Hold and do nothing) including icons or illustrations for each step.

Create a 'Roadmap' section presented as a satirical timeline with milestones that poke fun at typical crypto roadmaps (e.g. Phase 1: Launch. Phase 2: Go up. Phase 3: We figure it out. Phase 4: Moon?).
Create a 'Community' section with links/buttons to social platforms (Twitter/X, Telegram, Discord) styled as large, bold social cards, and a fun call-to-action encouraging users to join.
Create a footer with the coin name, a short disclaimer ('This is a meme coin with no intrinsic value or financial utility'), copyright notice, and social links.

Apply a bold, high-contrast meme-coin visual theme throughout the site: deep black background, vibrant yellow/gold accent color to reflect the coin branding, large chunky display fonts, glowing or neon effects on key elements, and playful micro-animations (e.g. coin spin, button hover glow). The overall aesthetic should feel energetic, irreverent, and viral.
Use the generated coin image (pointless-coin.dim_512x512.png) as the primary coin visual throughout the site — in the hero, the nav logo, the about section, and any other relevant locations.

new_feature_requests.summary: Replicate theuselesscoin.com layout and design for 'The Pointless Coin'
Use user-provided photo as the coin image throughout the site
